summary: This is an email exchange between FBI personnel regarding an analysis of Ghislaine Maxwell's credit cards. The email discusses discrepancies in American Express account numbers and seeks clarification on whether returns from a specific card have been received. It includes an attached forensic analysis of Maxwell's credit cards from financial productions.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The email discusses an analysis of her credit cards as part of a financial investigation, noting a specific American Express account with a statement closing date of December 18, 2019.

events.title: Last statement closing date for Maxwell's Amex card
events.description: Mentioned as the closing date of the last statement for a specific American Express card belonging to Ghislaine Maxwell.

events.title: Forensic analysis of Maxwell's credit cards provided
events.description: A forensic accountant at the FBI New York Field Office provided a draft analysis of Maxwell's credit cards from financial productions, intended for discussion purposes.

keyFacts: The FBI was conducting a forensic financial analysis of Ghislaine Maxwell's credit cards as part of an investigation.
A discrepancy was noted regarding an American Express card number: Amex account numbers typically start with 37, but the number provided for Maxwell's card started with 34.
The analysis was based on financial productions received by the FBI and was in draft form for discussion purposes only.
The email exchange indicates ongoing investigative work into Maxwell's financial activities in June 2020.
